request.description: Request containing the list of items to be added.

copyImages.description: Set to True to copy images from source stock item

SelectedRegions.description:
A list of row numbers for items selected in the my inventory grid. 
For instance if the first entry in the list is 4, 4; the selection was from the fourth row, to the fourth row.

Token.description:
An internal token used to identify the list of inventory items within a certain view.
From this, the inventory item ids can be extracted with the selected regions.

StockItemId.description: Stock Item Id. If not provided, it will be retrieved using the Item Number

inventoryItemIds.description: List of stock item IDs that needs to be deleted

InventoryItemIds.description: List of items by ids to delete. If not provided, you must provide ItemNumbers

ItemNumbers.description: List of items by item number to delete. If InventoryItemIds is provided, ItemNumbers will be ignored

ItemNumber.description: The ItemNumber (SKU) for the stock item. Only provided if passed in the request

InventoryItemId.description: The Id for the stock item. Always provided unless not found

AddExtendedProperties.description: If product extended properties needs to be added

ReloadAllImages.description: Reload all images for the template

Request.description: Details for the batch to be fetched

GetInventoryItemBatchInformationRequest.description: Used to get inventory item batch information

StockLocationId.description: The location to get the batch information from

AvailableOnly.description: Defines whether we should only return available items

AssignableOnly.description: Only return warehouse locations that can have orders assigned to them for picking

StockItemIds.description: A list of stock item ids

StockLocationId.description: The location to get the batch information from

AvailableOnly.description: Defines whether we should only return available items

InventoryItemBatchInformation.description: A list of stock item batch data

request.description: Stock item id and batch details

InventoryItemId.description: Conditional. If not provided, you must provide ItemNumber

ItemNumber.description: Conditional. if InventoryItemId is provided, ItemNumber will be ignored

GetStockItemIdsBySKURequest.description: Get stock itemids by sku request

SKUS.description: List of SKU's to search for

GetStockItemIdsBySKU.description: Get stock item id's by sku request class.

Items.description: Response items of StockItemId and SKU

GetStockItemIdsBySKUItem.description: Response item of StockItemId and SKU

inventoryItemImages.description: Inventory item ids and a list of image urls to be deleted for each item

InventoryItemId.description: The id of the item. If not provided, you must provide ItemNumber

ItemNumber.description: The item number (SKU) for the item. If InventoryItemId is provided, this will be ignored.

ImageIds.description: A list of images by image ids to delete for the item

ItemNumber.description: The Item Number (SKU). Only provided if passed in the request

categoryId.description: Unique id that identifies the category that you want to delete.

itemLocations.description: List of stock item location ids

propertyParams.description: Optional parameters to look for specific PropertyName and PropertyType

itemNumber.description: This can be used as an alternative to stockitemid

fkStockItemId.description: Stock Item ID, optional if SKU provided

SKU.description: Stock Item ID, optional if fkStockItemId provided

ItemNumber.description:
The ItemNumber (SKU) of the item
This is used to calculate the StockItemId if it has been omitted

itemNumber.description: The stock item SKU, only used if inventoryItemId is not supplied

supplier.description: Details of supplier to be added. Set pkSupplierId to a new uniqueidentifier
